headline: Reassessing Marriott (MAR) Valuation After Recent Share Price Pullback
summary: Marriott International (MAR) shares have cooled recently, slipping about 5% over the past week even though the stock is still up around 9% in the past 3 months and slightly positive over the year. See our latest analysis for Marriott International. That recent pullback comes after a solid run, with the share price still near $287.82 and a robust multi year total shareholder return suggesting that longer term momentum remains broadly intact even as near term enthusiasm cools.
